    DMMSyncServiceAdapter Class Reference

    Inherits from NSObject
    Declared in DMMSyncServiceAdapter.h

    Tasks

    •   interval property
    •   entityName property
    •   fetchedDataIDKey property
    • – initWithInterval:entityName:fetchedDataIDKey:

      Create a new synchronization adapter
    • – fetchDataWithCompletion:

      Data fetching method invoked by the synchronization service. Once the fetch is complete, the completion block must be invoked with the fetched data as the first argument. Override this method when subclassing DMMSyncServiceAdapter.

    Properties

    entityName

    @property (readonly, nonatomic, strong) NSString *entityName

    fetchedDataIDKey

    @property (readonly, nonatomic, strong) NSString *fetchedDataIDKey

    interval

    @property (readonly, nonatomic) NSTimeInterval interval

    Instance Methods

    fetchDataWithCompletion:

    Data fetching method invoked by the synchronization service. Once the fetch is complete, the completion block must be invoked with the fetched data as the first argument. Override this method when subclassing DMMSyncServiceAdapter.

    - (void)fetchDataWithCompletion:(SyncCompletionBlock)completionBlock

    Parameters

    completionBlock

    the block to invoke once the synchronization task is complete.

    Discussion

    Data fetching method invoked by the synchronization service. Once the fetch is complete, the completion block must be invoked with the fetched data as the first argument. Override this method when subclassing DMMSyncServiceAdapter.

    Declared In

    DMMSyncServiceAdapter.h

    initWithInterval:entityName:fetchedDataIDKey:

    Create a new synchronization adapter

    - (id)initWithInterval:(NSTimeInterval)seconds entityName:(NSString *)entityName fetchedDataIDKey:(NSString *)fetchedDataIDKey

    Parameters

    entityName

    the entity name of the Core Data model to be updated

    fetchedDataIDKey

    the name of a key on each of the fetched data dictionary objects uniquely identifying it in the array. The key is translated into a property name on the corresponding Core Data model using ObjectiveRecord’s mappings feature.

    interval

    time interval in seconds at which the adapter should be triggered

    Discussion

    Create a new synchronization adapter

    Declared In

    DMMSyncServiceAdapter.h
